name: Froggy dodge: collect the crowns!
description:
Froggy Dodge: place the frog in the right place! collect the crowns and avoid the bombs in this simple and addictive arcade game!

Special Features
 Multiplayer! - show your skills
 Challenge Friends - share your score online!
 Achievements - unlock new levels!
 Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Froggy dodge is completely free to play! Enjoy! Help the frog!

WHAT'S NEW
Hello to all our fans! This one is a big one! A lot of new features just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
